people.name: President of Israel
people.description: The President of the State of Israel  is the head of state of Israel.

people.name: Edward Teller
people.description: Edward Teller  was a Hungarian-American theoretical physicist who was born in Hungary, and is known colloquially as "the father of the hydrogen bomb", although he claimed he did not care for the title.

people.name: David Lloyd George
people.description: David Lloyd George, 1st Earl Lloyd-George of Dwyfor, OM, PC  was a British Liberal politician and statesman.

people.name: Max von Laue
people.description: Max Theodor Felix von Laue  was a German physicist who won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1914 for his discovery of the diffraction of X-rays by crystals.

people.name: Ilse Rosenthal-Schneider
people.description: Ilse Rosenthal-Schneider  was a German-Australian physicist and philosopher.

people.name: James Franck
people.description: James Franck  was a German physicist who won the 1925 Nobel Prize for Physics with Gustav Hertz "for their discovery of the laws governing the impact of an electron upon an atom".

people.name: Sean M. Carroll
people.description: Sean Michael Carroll  is a cosmologist and Physics professor specializing in dark energy and general relativity.

people.name: Enrico Fermi
people.description: Enrico Fermi  was an Italian physicist, who created the world's first nuclear reactor, the Chicago Pile-1.

people.name: Tsung-Dao Lee
people.description: Tsung-Dao Lee  is a Chinese-American physicist, known for his work on parity violation, the Lee Model, particle physics, relativistic heavy ion  physics, nontopological solitons and soliton stars.

items.name: Crowbar
items.description: A crowbar. Can be used to break chains

items.name: Physics
items.description: It is a book about Physics. It says: Physics  is the natural science that involves the study of matter and its motion and behavior through space and time, along with related concepts such as energy and force.   The following people are mentioned:  Max von Laue Ilse Rosenthal-Schneider   And the following place: German Empire

items.name: The Evolution of Physics: The Growth of Ideas From Early Concepts to Relativity and Quanta
items.description: It is a letter about The Evolution of Physics: The Growth of Ideas From Early Concepts to Relativity and Quanta. It says: The Evolution of Physics: The Growth of Ideas From Early Concepts to Relativity and Quanta is a science book for the lay reader, by Albert Einstein and Leopold Infeld, tracing the development of ideas in physics.   The following people are mentioned:  Physics Heinrich Hertz The Principles of Quantum Mechanics Albert Einstein Leopold Infeld  And the following place: Switzerland
